name: arcinfo
description: Sends the clan information embed into #arc-info

name: clantag-eng
description: Sends the clan tag information embed in English to #clan-tag

name: clantag-sk
description: Sends the clan tag information embed in Slovak to #clan-tag

name: recruitment
description: Sends the recruitment information embed into #recruitment

name: x2
description: Sends an announcement that x2 has been enabled on the server

name: restart
description: Restarts the bot server.

name: status
description: Edits the activity status.

options.name: type
options.description: Values: PLAYING, WATCHING, LISTENING

options.name: value
options.description: The description.

options.name: url
options.description: The streaming URL.

name: suggest
description: Sends your suggestion into the suggestion channel.

options.name: suggestion
options.description: Your suggestion.

name: help
description: Gets a list of commands to try.

options.name: command-name
options.description: What command would you like to learn more about, if any?

name: 8ball
description: Will give you a answer on your question.

options.name: question
options.description: The question that you want to ask.

name: convertcurrency
description: This will convert your currency to anoter currency.

options.name: old
options.description: The currency you have

options.name: new
options.description: The new currency that you want.

options.name: amount
options.description: The ammount that you want to convert.

name: corona
description: *No description provided.*

name: meme
description: Will show you a random meme <:kekw:943841369410138112>

name: randompassword
description: This will generate a random password for you.

options.name: lenght
options.description: The lenght of the password that you want.

name: serverinfo
description: Gives you the information about the server.

name: weather
description: Gets the current weather from the state.

options.name: state
options.description: The state that you want to get the current weather from.

name: activewinner
description: Announced the activity check winner.

options.name: member
options.description: Who do you want to strike?

name: activitycheck
description: Announced the activity check.

name: strike
description: Strikes a member

options.name: member
options.description: Who do you want to strike?

options.name: reason
options.description: Reason for striking this member.

name: userinfo
description: Gets the userinfo from the member.

options.name: member
options.description: The member that you want to get the info from.

name: userroles
description: Gets the userroles from the member.

options.name: member
options.description: The member that you want to get the roles from.

name: warn
description: Warns a member

options.name: member
options.description: Who do you want to warn?

options.name: reason
options.description: Reason for warning this member.

name: report
description: Reports a member.

options.name: user
options.description: The username of the user you want to report.

options.name: reason
options.description: Reason for reporting the user.

name: apply
description: Apply for the clan

name: dm
description: DMs others using the bot.

options.name: member
options.description: The member that you want to send a DM.

options.name: message
options.description: The message that you want to send.

name: playerstats
description: Get player statistics

options.name: playerId
options.description: The player ID

name: uptime
description: Gets the uptime of the bot
